author: KingAlanI
title: Archery setup good but other parts random
review:
The actual archery range was good, but the chair and the hedgehog seemed random; Friends does have a problem with putting cute animals in sets where they don't really fit.

I liked the two types of target and how they'd actually work with the stud shooter. Like usual for those, if actually used, the piece could bounce all over the room. Another bow might look better for display; I took the black compound bow from a spare 70332 Ultimate Aaron.

Like most small sets, it was a simple build.

The set was a good value for parts once discounted, but would've been better if it focused on the archery itself.
